abstract: Yet another big name has emerged as a skeptic of the deal to sell Bear Stearns to JPMorgan Chase — and it’s a former predecessor to Ben Bernanke.
lead_paragraph: Yet another big name has emerged as a skeptic of the deal to sell Bear Stearns to JPMorgan Chase — and it’s a former predecessor to Ben Bernanke.

headline.main: Volcker Questions Fed’s Role in Bear Deal
